thread.title: Frightened, charging leopard gives ex Doctor Who actor the fright of his life
thread.title_full: Frightened, charging leopard gives ex Doctor Who actor the fright of his life

author: News Published Hrs
title: Frightened, charging leopard gives ex Doctor Who actor the fright of his life
text:
Share Frightened, charging leopard gives ex Doctor Who actor the fright of his life 
Doctor Who and Harry Potter actor turned wildlife documentary presenter David Tennant has had a narrow escape from an angry leopard while filming in Botswana. 
Tennant and his crew had been filming the leopard trying to fight off a pack of wild dogs that had it cornered for the BBC Two program Spy in the Wild. 
But the angry cat quickly turned its attention to the camera crew, and closed on them with frightening pace, apparently to seek refuge in their truck. 
The video shows the men quickly abandon their camera, which continues to record their shouts as the animal jumps onto their vehicle. 
One quick thinking member of the crew managed to buy them the time they needed to escape though. 
A split second decision to throw their hat to distract the cat proved effective, and Tennant can be heard suggesting it may be a good time to leave before it decided to come back. Most Viewed
